name: .TFRD File Extension
summary: Learn about .TFRD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Imaging data format used by the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency (NGA) for storing geospatial data; can contain both image and text data; used for rendering geolocational data within GIS applications.

content: TFRD files are similar to .NITF files, but they use greater compression. They can be opened by various NITFS applications.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
